comments:
When I select 'Find and Install' or 'Manage Configuration' I get an exception in
the error log and no window. I have one plugin installed (Checkclipse v 1.3.0,
which claims it's 3.0 compatible and does indeed seem to work.) 'Configuration
Details' on the 'About Eclipse Platform' dialog gives the same result --
Exception with no UI action.

This looks like a you've installed a recent eclipse driver on top of an 
existing one. Try installing eclipse in a clean location and this should go 
away.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 56937 ***
